reviewText: Can't find a better deal on three good movies! Was worth it just to watch B.S. Dracula on Blu-ray!
Fun "classics" ! Recommend for a good collection.

If only the The Wolfman can be part of this collection but I am glad to own these movies on blu ray for the upcoming halloween season. Movie looks great and the condition is great. Thank you very much
I like all these films but why are you putting wolf in the set instead of the wolf man with Anthony Hopkins.
Classic movies remastered and waiting to be collected , any fan of these movie's must have this collection .
